meanings.definition: The act of removing political influence or considerations from a situation.
meanings.sent1: The de-politicization of the decision-making process ensured fairness for everyone involved.
meanings.sent2: The de-politicization of the city council meetings led to more efficient discussions.
meanings.sent3: After the de-politicization of the school board, the debates became less dramatic and more focused on solutions.
meanings.sent4: The de-politicization of the courtroom turned the legal proceedings into a neutral and unbiased process.
meanings.sent5: Through de-politicization, the organization aimed to create a transparent and accountable system.

meanings.definition: The process of making something less political in nature.
meanings.sent1: The de-politicization of the media was necessary to ensure unbiased reporting.
meanings.sent2: The de-politicization of the charity event helped it appeal to a wider audience.
meanings.sent3: The de-politicization of the family gathering made the discussions more harmonious.
meanings.sent4: The de-politicization of the workplace environment improved overall morale.
meanings.sent5: Through de-politicization, the organization aimed to foster unity among its members.
